body:
I believe there may be an error in the CMake package.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install cmake+qt
```

### Error Message
```console
==> Error: +qt does not satisfy ~qt
```

"-d --stacktrace" output is attached.

[spack-cmake.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/3271623/spack-cmake.txt)
title: cmake+qt package error
